body_html: Quick Question (sorry if it's not the right place to ask, and if I'm missing something really obvious on NVIDIA's Website): Do CUDA 9 & cuDNN 7 provide better performance on non-Volta (Pascal) GPUs? Are these noticeable when training Neural Nets?
